revision.comment: /* top */ clean up, replaced: hynix → SK hynix, SK SK hynix → SK hynix
revision.text:
{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = UP Squared 01.png |image1_size = 150px |caption = UP Squared Developer Board |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://www.aaeon.com/en/p/iot-gateway-maker-boards-up-squared |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = UP |model = Squared |submodelappend = yes |submodel = Duo Core 02/32 |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = single-board computer |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = 1907UPAP03 |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Intel Celeron;N3360; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = x86-64 |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- x86-64 Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 2.4 GHz<!-- undocumented --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = Serial |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = SK hynix;H26M64208EMR; |flash1size = 32 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla2_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla2chip = Winbond;W25Q128FVSQ; |flash2size = 16 |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = LPDDR4 |ram1type1 = SDRAM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 2 GiB |ram1chip = Samsung;K4F8E304HB-MGCJ; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth1chip = Realtek;RTL8111G; |eth2chip = Realtek;RTL8111G; |dsl_ports = |voip_ports = |wan_ports = <!-- 1 --> |wan_speed = <!-- 10MbE,100MbE,1GbE, --> |lan_ports = 2 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:07:32
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = Grub;2.02;; |stockos = Linux;4.10.0-9;Ubuntu 16.04;
|exp_if_types = USB 3.0, Mini PCIe, M.2, SATA 3.0 |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = 2 |exp_usb_num = 4 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = 1 |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 4 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.1 |pwr_barrel_len = 9.5 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 10-pin header,, populated,, (115200 8N1) |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = HDMI 1.4b, DisplayPort, eDP, LVDS, MIPI CSI, WoL, RTC w/ battery, I2C, I2S, SPI, ADC, UART, GPIO, heat sink |addchip = FPGA;Intel Altera;MAX10 10M02;;1;,,, PMIC for Intel Apollo Lake;TI;TPS65094;;1;,,, 64K I2C Serial EEPROM;Microchip;24LC64;;1;,,, 2 Differential Channel 2-to-1 Multiplexer/Demultiplexer Switch for PCIe;NXP;CBTL02042A;;1;,,, 30V Dual N-Channel MOSFET;Fairchild;FDMS7620S;;1;,,, 30V Dual N-Channel MOSFET;Fairchild;FDMC7200S;;1;,,, 30V P-Channel MOSFET;Fairchild;FDS6681Z;;1;,,, 30V P-Channel MOSFET;Fairchild;FDMC4435BZ;;3;,,, 3A 55V Boost Converter;MPS;MP3425;;1;,,, 10A 18V Synchronous Step-Down Converter;MPS;MP8762;;1; |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = acquired via DHCP |defaultlogin = upsquared |defaultpass = upsquared |manuf = AAEON |manuf_model = UPS-APLC2F-A20-0232 |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = Android 7.1, Windows IoT Core
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 04/2017 |estprice = 98 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Taiwan
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "UP-ALP01 A1.0_0_0", "P/N 1907UPAP03" and "MADE IN TAIWAN" are silkscreened on board top near display ports.
Provided as part of [https://www.seeedstudio.com/UP-Grove-IoT-Development-Kit-p-2994.html ''UP² Grove IoT Development Kit'']
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Intel Celeron]]'' Dual-Core (@2.4GHz) *Memory: 2GB LPDDR4 SDRAM *Storage: 16MB Serial Flash, :32GB eMMC 5.1, SATA 3 *Network: 2x Gigabit Ethernet *USB: 3x USB 3.0 ports, 1x USB 3.0 OTG port *Power: 5V, 4A via barrel
==Links of Interest== [https://up-board.org/upsquared/specifications/ Sales Page] [https://github.com/up-board/up-community/wiki Community Wiki]
===Reviews=== *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2016/11/01/up-squared-apollo-lake-development-board-comes-with-up-to-8gb-ram-128-gb-storage-for-89-euros-and-up-crowdfunding/ ''UP Squared Apollo Lake Development Board'' on '''CNX-Software'''] *[https://linuxgizmos.com/sub-100-dollar-maker-board-packs-apollo-lake-4k-video-dual-gbe/ ''Sub-$100 maker board packs Apollo Lake SoC'' on '''LinuxGizmos''']
